import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import productcontext from "../context/Productcontext"; import StarRatings from "react-star-ratings"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; const {Link} = require("react-router-dom"); export default function Productdetails() { const { singleproduct,addid ,addtocart} = useContext(productcontext); const[size,setsize]=useState() const[quantity,setquantity]=useState(1) const[nullsize,setnullsize]=useState() const[inputsize,setinputsize]=useState(null) const[lengthvalue,setlengthvalue]=useState() const onclick=async()=>{ if(size==null) { setnullsize("please select a size ") setTimeout(() => { setnullsize(null) }, 1500); } else{ await addtocart(addid,quantity,size) setinputsize("item added to cart") setTimeout(() => { setinputsize(null) }, 1500); } } const onchange=(e)=>{ // e.preventDefault(); setsize( e.target.value ) } const set_rating_length=(e)=>{ const {value,maxLength}=e.target; const fix_length = value.slice(0,maxLength) setlengthvalue(fix_length) } const onplus=()=>{ setquantity(quantity+1) } const onminus=()=>{ if(quantity>1){ setquantity(quantity-1) } } return ( <>
